video.title: Hawaii Five-0
video.synopsis: Hawaii's top cops are reborn in this update of an iconic TV show. They may work in paradise, but there's enough crime to keep them working overtime.

episodes.synopsis: When Steve McGarrett returns home to Honolulu to bury his murdered father, the governor asks him to head up a new elite police unit.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When a former cyber-terrorism expert is kidnapped, Five-O must find the missing expert before national security is compromised.
episodes.title: 'Ohana (Family)

episodes.synopsis: After an escalating gang war wreaks havoc during a high school football game, Five-0 discovers a connection between Samoan gangs and a mainland mob.
episodes.title: Malama Ka Aina (Respect the Land)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 is called in to locate a dangerous escaped prisoner, but to find him they must first determine his reasons for escaping.
episodes.title: Lanakila (Victory)

episodes.synopsis: When a teenage girl's body is found near Waikiki, Steve and the team are assigned to find her missing sister, the daughter of an ambassador.
episodes.title: Nalowale (Forgotten/Missing)

episodes.synopsis: When the CEO of a successful surf company is murdered, Five-0 delves into the world of North Shore surfing.
episodes.title: Ko'olauloa (North Shore of O'ahu)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett must rely on his SEAL skills to diffuse a hostage situation aboard retired battleship U.S.S. Missouri.
episodes.title: Ho'apono (Accept)

episodes.synopsis: The team goes up against Internal Affairs, dirty cops and a powerful cocaine cartel when they investigate the murder of Danny's ex-partner.
episodes.title: Mana'o (Belief)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 must protect a ruthless dictator from assassination while investigating the killing of a member of the tyrant's security detail.
episodes.title: Po'ipu (The Siege)

episodes.synopsis: When a ring of thieves targets an armored car and kills the guards, the only lead in the case forces Danny to ask his ex-wife for help.
episodes.title: Heihei (Race)

episodes.synopsis: When the team investigates the kidnapping of a woman and the murder of a man, Dr. Bergman links the current case to several unsolved murders.
episodes.title: Palekaiko (Paradise)

episodes.synopsis: Soon after Victor Hesse returns to Hawaii, Chin finds himself taken hostage and strapped to a bomb.
episodes.title: Hana 'a'a Makehewa (Desperate Measures)

episodes.synopsis: The Japanese mafia's possible involvement in the murder of Steve's mother surfaces after Mary Ann McGarrett is kidnapped and the Champ box is stolen.
episodes.title: Ke Kinohi (The Beginning)

episodes.synopsis: A high-speed police chase leaves the driver dead, but also results in a shocking discovery that leads the team to Chin's ex-fiancé.
episodes.title: He Kane Hewa'ole (An Innocent Man)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 must find the missing head of the Tsunami Warning Center just as the island is about to be assaulted by a major tsunami.
episodes.title: Kai e'e (Tidal Wave)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0's latest assignment involves finding and protecting a missing witness in a high-profile murder case.
episodes.title: E Malama (To Protect)

episodes.synopsis: The team must deal with pirates who hijack a pleasure cruise full of students on spring break.
episodes.title: Powa Maka Moana (Pirate)

episodes.synopsis: When a judge's daughter is murdered, the team must determine the killer's motive before more victims turn up.
episodes.title: Loa Aloha (The Long Goodbye)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 combs a convention to find the killer of a sci-fi fan who was thrown out of a high-rise window, and McGarrett gets a visit from the CIA.
episodes.title: Na Me'e Laua Na Paio (Heroes and Villains)

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Danny stumble upon a homicide case while out in the jungle searching for Hawaiian petroglyphs.
episodes.title: Ma Ke Kahakai (Shore)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 must intervene when a NYPD detective goes seeking revenge against a local crime lord.
episodes.title: Ho'opa'i (Revenge)

episodes.synopsis: A renowned photographer has been murdered, and Danny thinks this case may be his best one yet because he gets to interview swimsuit models.
episodes.title: Ho'ohuli Na'au (Close to Heart)

episodes.synopsis: Agent Kaye's information has helped Five-0 close in on capturing Wo Fat, but before they can act, Danny is exposed to a lethal chemical.
episodes.title: Ua Hiki Mai Kapalena Pau (Until the End Is Near)

episodes.synopsis: As McGarrett and his team close in, criminal mastermind Wo Fat retaliates against Five-0.
episodes.title: Oia'i'o (Trust)

episodes.synopsis: Danny works to help clear Steve's name with the help of an old friend, and Kono goes on leave while under investigation by Internal Affairs.
episodes.title: Ha'i'ole (Unbreakable)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 investigates the kidnapping of a teenager, and a profiler is assigned to the team by the new governor.
episodes.title: Ua Lawe Wale (Taken)

episodes.synopsis: When a Navy SEAL turns up dead, Joe asks McGarrett to take a second look at his death.
episodes.title: Kame'e (The Hero)

episodes.synopsis: When a local deep-sea diver is murdered, Five-0 heads into the ocean to find the killer.
episodes.title: Mea Makamae (Treasure)

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the murder of a volleyball coach, Five-0 uncovers new evidence about one of their own.
episodes.title: Ma'ema'e (Clean)

episodes.synopsis: Steve ends up in a charity MMA fight while investigating the murder of a local restaurant owner.
episodes.title: Ka Hakaka Maika'i (The Good Fight)

episodes.synopsis: As the Five-0 team investigates a young couple killed while filming a documentary, a transient places Danny under a curse.
episodes.title: Ka Iwi Kapu (Sacred Bones)

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into a plane crash and a dead customs agent leads the team to question if the victim was alive before takeoff.
episodes.title: Lapa'au (Healing)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 has trouble identifying a body discovered in the trunk of a stolen car because of the physical alterations to the victim.
episodes.title: Ike Maka (Identity)

episodes.synopsis: Jenna Kaye asks McGarrett to help her deliver a ransom to North Korea to rescue her fiancé.
episodes.title: Ki'ilua (Deceiver)

episodes.synopsis: When a busload of children goes missing, the team must rescue the youngsters and find those responsible.
episodes.title: Pahele (Trapped)

episodes.synopsis: A man left for dead in an abandoned bunker leads Five-0 to a case being investigated by Capt. Fryer.
episodes.title: Alaheo Pau'ole (Gone Forever)

episodes.synopsis: A professional hit on a teenager has Five-0 searching for the reason why in order to determine who killed her.
episodes.title: Ka Ho'oponopono (The Fix)

episodes.synopsis: Chin Ho relates some earth-shattering news to McGarrett concerning Joe White, resulting in a hostile confrontation.
episodes.title: Pu'olo (The Package)

episodes.synopsis: A crooked cop seeking revenge against Danny visits the island, putting Danny and his family in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Mai Ka Wa Kahiko (Out of the Past)

episodes.synopsis: When the actions of Five-0 nearly result in an international incident, Lt. Governor Denning announces that one team member will be fired.
episodes.title: I Helu Pu (The Reckoning)

episodes.synopsis: A history buff helps Five-0 with their investigation of a man dressed as a Hawaiian NaKoa warrior who was found murdered in the jungle.
episodes.title: Kupale (Defender)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 investigate the mysterious death of a radio DJ and uncovers evidence that leads them to a local detective and retired NYPD bomb expert.
episodes.title: Lekio (Radio)

episodes.synopsis: In order to clear his sister when she's arrested for smuggling conflict diamonds, McGarrett tracks down a former diamond trafficker.
episodes.title: Kalele (Faith)

episodes.synopsis: Max reveals some private information about his childhood in order to convince Five-0 that a serial killer is on the loose.
episodes.title: Ha'alele (Abandoned)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 gets heavy-duty backup from the mainland when a terrorist threatens to release a deadly virus if his demands are not met.
episodes.title: Pa Make Loa (Touch of Death)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett captures Wo Fat in a special-ops raid, but he soon learns that the Yakuza have targeted them both for execution.
episodes.title: Ua Hopu (Caught)

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for a killer after an officer is murdered.
episodes.title: Ua Hala (Death in the Family)

episodes.synopsis: Following the return of McGarrett's mother, the team is determined to track down Wo Fat for killing an important member of their family.
episodes.title: La O Na Makuahine (Mother's Day)

episodes.synopsis: The team asks August March for assistance when an art heist turns deadly, and McGarrett asks Catherine to help him locate his mother.
episodes.title: Kanalua (Doubt)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett and Danny's relaxing day at sea takes a deadly turn when their boat is hijacked and they're left to die in the middle of the ocean.
episodes.title: Lana I Ka Moana (Adrift)

episodes.synopsis: Doris McGarrett pays an unexpected visit to her son while the team investigates the death of a polo player who literally loses his head.
episodes.title: Popilikia (Misfortune)

episodes.synopsis: The clock is ticking on Halloween when a grisly murder leads the team to a ritualistic killing, and evidence suggests the killer will strike again.
episodes.title: Mohai (Offering)

episodes.synopsis: While bomb technicians work to disarm a bomb, McGarrett distracts Danny by getting him to talk about his toughest case.
episodes.title: I Ka Wa Mamua (In a Time Past)

episodes.synopsis: While the team investigates the murder of a young computer hacker, McGarrett tries to stage a long-needed reunion between his mother and his sister.
episodes.title: Ohuna (The Secret)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett plays cat and mouse with a smart, seductive therapist, who he believes murdered her patient. Catherine hunts one of Doris's old targets.
episodes.title: Wahine'inoloa (Wicked Woman)

episodes.synopsis: Max and his crush get put in harm's way when a botched bank robbery leads the team to determine that the criminals had unexpected motives.
episodes.title: Ha'awe Make Loa (Death Wish)

episodes.synopsis: An Aloha Girls camping trip with Grace turns deadly when an armed man takes McGarrett and a little girl hostage. Meanwhile, Kono meets Adam's brother.
episodes.title: Huaka'i Kula (Field Trip)

episodes.synopsis: With Christmas in the air, McGarrett and Catherine meet a boy whose father is missing -- and who might be in deadly trouble.
episodes.title: Kahu (Guardian)

episodes.synopsis: The team must investigate the death of an O'ahu State University professor who was found dead in an acid bath. But there are several viable suspects.
episodes.title: Kapu (Forbidden)

episodes.synopsis: When Chin is kidnapped and dropped in the middle of Halawa Prison, he must fight for his life to escape before the other inmates recognize him.
episodes.title: Olelo Ho'Opa'I Make (Death Sentence)

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of an election, the governor asks Five-O to investigate the murder of a prostitute who was found in the bed of a missing congressman.
episodes.title: Hana I Wa'Ia (Scandal)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 investigates when a mysterious man targets select police officers for revenge -- and McGarrett is the next on his hit list.
episodes.title: Hookman

episodes.synopsis: The Five-0 investigates the murder of a Lua master, and McGarrett hires a private investigator to follow his mother.
episodes.title: Kekoa (Warrior)

episodes.synopsis: During Pro Bowl football weekend, Five-0 investigates the murder of a tech executive with the help of a star football player.
episodes.title: Pa'ani (The Game)

episodes.synopsis: When a murder victim falls onto Dog the Bounty Hunter's SUV, Catherine goes undercover as a jammer at the local roller derby to find the culprit.
episodes.title: Na Ki'i (Dolls)

episodes.synopsis: When threats turn deadly against a tour company that endangers the local shark population, Five-0 must narrow down the suspect list.
episodes.title: Hoa Pili (Close Friend)

episodes.synopsis: When McGarrett and Catherine cross into North Korea to retrieve the remains of a fallen friend, McGarrett recounts his last deadly mission there.
episodes.title: Olelo Pa'a (The Promise)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 allows a talk show host and her crew to follow them for the day, but the investigation turns dangerous when they have a run-in with Wo Fat.
episodes.title: Imi Loko Ka 'Uhane (Seek Within One's Soul)

episodes.synopsis: When the body of a young girl who was kidnapped 10 years ago turns up, Five-0 must hunt down the kidnappers, who've now taken another victim.
episodes.title: Ho'opio (To Take Captive)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett must help his mother execute a covert op. Meanwhile, Kono's life is in danger when she closes in on Adam's secret.
episodes.title: He Welo 'Oihana (Family Business)

episodes.synopsis: As the CIA tasks Five-0 with finding a dangerous killer loose on the island, Kono goes on the run for a murder she didn't commit.
episodes.title: Aloha, Malama Pono (Farewell and Take Care)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett and the team battle the NLM terrorists who have kidnapped Catherine, then discover that information about Kono and Adam has been stolen.
episodes.title: Aloha Ke Kahi I Ke Kahi (We Need One Another)

episodes.synopsis: The Five-0 team aides a Texas Ranger searching for his kidnapped daughter, and Kono and Adam flee into the jungle to escape their Yakuza pursuers.
episodes.title: A'ale Ma'a Wau (Fish Out of Water)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 enlists a conspiracy expert to solve the murders of a wealthy couple who possessed an artifact that might be the key to a secret society.
episodes.title: Ka'oia i'o Ma Loko (The Truth Within)

episodes.synopsis: Family secrets are exposed when a wedding crasher is killed, with the runaway bride being the main suspect. Kono captures a would-be assassin.
episodes.title: A ia la aku (From This Day Forward)

episodes.synopsis: Catherine and Billy are attacked during a stakeout, and the investigation uncovers corporate espionage, a hired killer and an obsessive love affair.
episodes.title: Kupu'eu (Fallen Hero)

episodes.synopsis: While Five-0 investigates a bizarre case involving a deranged doctor experimenting on humans, Catherine uncovers information about a man chasing Kono.
episodes.title: Kupouli 'la (Broken)

episodes.synopsis: The team works to clear the name of a murdered ATF agent who is suspected of having turned rogue, and Catherine officially becomes a member of Five-0.
episodes.title: Ua Nalohia (In Deep)

episodes.synopsis: While Kono searches for Adam, McGarrett is forced to work with Grover to apprehend a brilliant hacker who has infiltrated several security networks.
episodes.title: Akanahe (Reluctant Partners)

episodes.synopsis: When a Secret Service agent is murdered, the team scrambles to uncover the assassin's real target, and McGarrett deals with a painful personal issue.
episodes.title: Hau'oli La Ho'omaika'I (Happy Thanksgiving)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett leads the emotional investigation of a case involving a Pearl Harbor veteran accused of killing a Japanese-American internee in 1943.
episodes.title: Ho'onani Makuakane (Honor Thy Father)

episodes.synopsis: Chin's life is endangered as he pursues a complicated case involving a serial killer while Danny and Grace find an unusual puzzle box on the beach.
episodes.title: Pukana (Keepsake)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett teams up with Grover to find Grover's missing friend, who's on the run from gangsters, while Danny looks into a physically bizarre shooting.
episodes.title: O kela me keia Manawa (Now and Then)

episodes.synopsis: It's a tense time for Chin Ho when he is questioned by Internal Affairs about his involvement with a drug overlord who may have killed Chin's father.
episodes.title: Hana Lokomaika'i (The Favor)

episodes.synopsis: A desperate man abducts McGarrett and Danny, insisting that he was framed for murder and asking them to clear his name by finding the real culprits.
episodes.title: Na hala a ka makua (Sins of the Father)

episodes.synopsis: While Five-0 rounds up an illegal firearms ring, McGarrett helps Grover deal with a reporter prying into a painful secret from his past in Chicago.
episodes.title: Pale 'la (Buried Secrets)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 investigates a triple murder linked to a downed Chinese satellite; Danny's mother goes on a ride-along with Grover.
episodes.title: Hoku Welowelo (Fire in the Sky)

episodes.synopsis: Five-0 searches for the abducted daughter of a murdered man; Danny tries to derail his parents' divorce; McGarrett gets a new clue about "Shelbourne."
episodes.title: Ma Lalo o ka 'ili (Beneath the Surface)

episodes.synopsis: A classmate of Chin Ho and Jerry is killed during their high school reunion; McGarrett and Danny travel to Cambodia to find the grave site.
episodes.title: Ho'i Hou (Reunited)

episodes.synopsis: When an informant's tip on a weapons deal turns out to be false, McGarrett and Danny end up trapped in the wreckage of a blown-up building.
episodes.title: Ku I Ka Pili Koko (Blood Brothers)

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a murder, Five-0 uncovers an Islamic terrorist plot involving radical college students planning an attack on U.S. soil.
episodes.title: Pe'epe'e Kanaka (Those Among Us)

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett and Catherine travel to Afghanistan to help her longtime friend, whose young son has been kidnapped by the Taliban.
episodes.title: Makani 'olu a holo malie (Fair Winds and Following Seas)

episodes.synopsis: Grover is forced to help a cyber-criminal steal $100 million when the thief kidnaps his daughter, and Wo Fat proves difficult to control.
episodes.title: O ka Pili'Ohana ka 'Oi (Family Comes First)
